entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
